message: @vorepad This is awesome!
Thanks for building this!
So what's the deal with the dice/music? Will Vorepad interpret those in topics?
Also had two crashes on delete after trying those features
But prefer convoread logo to avatars
Autocomplete is turning convore to convoread !!
Been waiting for something like this for a while
Think group list should not have ANY icons
Dice will post message in topic, music will too but vorepad will interpret them and play a sound
It's just so repetitive
fair enough :) I'm off to lunch. thanks for the feedback!
Still want to say awesome for first release
"Mark as read" should be it it's own ui element with setting to disable confirm
K thx. Will investigate
interesting, will think about how to do that
Yeah, mostly done in first update. Knew ppl would ask for that
Np! Thanks for using it!
Hmm thx for report.. Deleting messages or topics?
Short flicker of badge in topic list when adding message
yeah, it shouldn't do that most of the time, there are some corner cases where it does, though.... need to squash that
let's leave it to fate... heads they stay, tails they go away and are put into options panel...
Flipped a coin: Heads
whee!!
Rolled dice. Saw it posted in topic. Deleted message. Boom.  Same for music.
I tried that but looked incredibly boring...
thanks :) yeah i decided to kick it out the door w/ a few niggles instead of spending another week trying to make it 100% perfect and never getting there
there are already a few new cool features in the codebase coming for the first update... and bug fixes of course
When left pane returns to group list while topic still in right. Maybe highlight current group
Maybe a mention list can be combined with dm view?
The dice/ music. I would disable by default and/or combine. They are fun but not standard for convore and feel too much like clutter from a developer playing around ;-)
yeah, been thinking about how to do mention list properly.. that's the one major feature that's not there yet
I'll let other users bring if back up if they choose
Ha
Is there no search?
Found group search under "+"
I hope stars will pin topics and groups to the top, that would dramatically improve Convore overall
2nd is the flow for clicking on a URL in a message
Especially across different groups
Instant millionaire
My biggest complaint is probably the icon
Also, what does marking a group as "Favorite" do?
This is a pretty epic first release
Also I'd love if tapping on a toast brought you to the message
Is it tap => details => tap or am I missing it
Love that you have direct messages already
Dice and music should be in app purchases ;)
I'd also love if you could swipe an open topic left or right to view another open topic, or some other way of jumping between topics really quickly
hah, ur not the first to suggest dice/sound be IAP
marking group or topic as favorite means that you'll get a toast msg when someone posts in that group/topic if you are not currently viewing the corresponding topic. tapping toast will take you there
there is group search, if that is what you are asking? there is no message search
tapping toast does bring you to message (except for stars) i.e. mentions, DMs, and favorited group/topic msgs
i like the idea of pinning fav groups/topics to top, we'll see if i can do that, or if convore does something similar shortly (rumor is they might)

clicking url is clunky, yes.. tap msg, tap details, tap link.... the msgs are actually blitted as images in the topic to improve scrolling/animation performance. so, can't display urls differently or detect taps (w/o some major logic changing, which i might add later on)
re: icon... if you or someone can provide a better one, i'll use it. i can't do graphics at all, so i went with old school Paint skillz
Hmmm lots of missing avatars...
@ptone please give some examples? i will investigate
Tapping a toast just closes the toast for me. I'll restart and try again
@jazzychad have you tried tweetbot? I love how they do urls and other actions. When you tap on a tweet it becomes actionable
A big change for sure, but might work nicely in vorepad
Damn
Flipped a coin: Tails

@defunkt if you tap a toast in the icon, it will close it... if you tap it in message/text part, it will do whatever action it is supposed to. the only toasts that don't have actions are login/logout and stars
mentions, dms, and favorite groups/topics should all do stuff
yeah, seen how tweetbot does it... thinking about how to mimic their implementation
Is there a way to delete PMs. You can't on the Convore site, but supposedly it's in the API.
@ptone I'd prefer the Avatars, less repetitive, but not a plain list. Either way it's not a deal breaker.
That's all that's available through the API last time I checked
You can't delete whole conversations or pms from other users if that's what you're asking. You can only delete pms you have sent
@jazzychad - thanks for the app! Keep developing it - it's damn useful!
@JofArnold thanks!
The update for the app just came out today
